title: How can vaccines, against COVID for example, affect life energy, vibrations, and our twin flame bond? Is it fatal or can it be cured?
description: Answer (1 of 21): Please stop reading alt-right websites and Q-Anon nonsense. Vaccines do not affect your energy field, Twin Flame connection, etc - unless you BELIEVE that they do, and in this case, you can create all kinds of issues in your mind. This is called 'nocebo" - negative belief making...
